categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: Garbage Run is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The Ugnaught Ukert, founder of Reclamation Services, Inc., tasks Rebel Alliance players with picking up a load of recyclables from Botha Ammunitions Corporation on the planet Kothlis.
